name: My Dog Life -Japanese Shiba Inu Edition
name_original: My Dog Life -Japanese Shiba Inu Edition
description:
This is the best dog app.
- You can grow a dog (japanese shiba inu).
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should only feed and walk with your dog.
Your dog will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of dog in your daily life!
